text: L.I.E. is a 2001 American drama movie. The movie is about a relationship between a 15-year old boy and a pedophile. The title is an acronym for "Long Island Expressway". L.I.E. received an NC-17 rating from the MPAA. The rating was surrendered, meaning that the filmmakers preferred to release the movie without a rating instead of releasing it with the NC-17 rating. Later, an edited R-rated version was also released. This movie was released on January 20, 2001. Category:2001 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about child sexual abuse
title: L.I.E.
